Posts.Content: Hi my name Is Joann i had stage 1 breast cancer in 2010 i had 35 treatments of radiation. I was put on painkillers. Then had neck surgery that went well, 3 months ago my doctor took off one of the pain meds ,and now all the pain in my rib cage has returned severly. I have read about others have this same problem, At least now i know I am not alone. God bless and take care
Posts.Title: Breast cancer and rib cage pain
